description: Replace hardcoded theme values with theme provider tokens and wire up button actions across 60 frontend components

workstreams.notes: 7 of 10 complete. SessionTimeoutWarning, MFASetup, StatWidget, ExpenseList, RunningTimer fully updated. DeadlinesList, KPICard, CaseListView, DocumentViewer, DocumentAnnotations remaining.
AutocompleteSelect, ConnectionStatus, ThemePreview, AdvancedThemeCustomizer, DocketList, ClientPortalModal, ClientAnalytics, SatisfactionCard, RiskCard, NotificationSystem
DeleteConfirmModal, EnhancedCaseTimeline, CaseCard, documents.tsx, FilingsTable, PartiesTable, TaskCreationModal, CaseFilters, CaseTimeline, CaseQuickActions
billing.tsx, CaseHeader, CompliancePolicies, CalendarView, BillingErrorBoundary, LEDESBilling, PleadingDesigner, DocumentCanvas, AIDraftingAssistant, CorrespondenceDetail

ComposeCorrespondence, ComposeMessageModal, CorrespondenceView, DynamicFormBuilder, BackendHealthMonitor, DeadlineList (calendar), DataSourceSelector, NotificationCenter, SystemHealthDisplay, reports/index.tsx
FilterPanel, CaseAnalytics, DateRangeSelector, BillingAnalytics, MetricCard, StrategyBuilder, LitigationView, LitigationProperties, PlaybookLibrary, DeadlineList (duplicate check)

decisions.decision: Batch processing approach - 6 phases of 10 components each
decisions.rationale: 60 components is large scope. Systematic batching ensures quality and allows for pattern refinement between phases
User provided this as updated reference. Maintains consistency with recent work

decisions.decision: Wire buttons to real API endpoints from frontend-api layer
decisions.rationale: API layer already exists with proper error handling. Connect UI to existing infrastructure

decisions.decision: Focus primarily on theme token replacement, not action wiring
decisions.rationale: Analysis revealed most components already have actions properly wired. 90% of work is theme token replacement, not connecting stubbed buttons

decisions.decision: Established consistent theme token patterns across components
decisions.rationale: Status badges, forms, tables, buttons all follow same pattern. Ensures visual consistency and maintainability
